channel.title: Help with range no one will help!
channel.description: I wanted to know if anyone knew how to add fully working range on a server im working on a server and as most people know that on most servers you cant range from far away and have to stand right next to them to attack someone well i wanted to know how to add fully working range so i can attack people from far away and stuff some please post thx and dont say to use the search tab because i have and i cant find it

item.title: Help with range no one will help!
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

Yes.
You can add full range on a server.
Just anyone with the IQ under 12 won’t be able to do it.
Your not going to find any help here.
I guarantee you. No one is going to spoon feed you.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with range no one will help!

item.title: Help with range no one will help!
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Change your attacking method so if a player attacks with a bow they don’t run towards their opponent.

Read full topic
